title._content: Entrance to the Little Wonder Coal Mine

description._content: 1911 10.3 x 8.5 cm 1 Black and white photograph. Caption on back "Dickie Mills Coal Mine. circa 1908-1923." People are unidentified. Proper name of the mine owner was Johnathon James Mills. For more information about the Gibson And Little Wonder Coal Mines, see ERCB Coal Mine Atlas: Operating and Abandoned Coal Mines In Alberta, Second Edition (Calgary, 1988), available in the Archives. The donor obtained these copy photographs from Mary Turnbull. To obtain high quality and larger reproductions of this image please visit the Galt Museum & Archives website: www.galtmuseum.com/archives.htm and include thIs number in your request: P19881042016
